description: Man Utd podcast: Bournemouth defeat and Amorim's system discussed on The Devils' Advocate
title: Man Utd podcast: Bournemouth defeat and Amorim's system discussed on The Devils' Advocate
title_page: Man Utd podcast: Bournemouth defeat and Amorim's system discussed on The Devils' Advocate - BBC Sport
maintext:
A new episode of BBC Radio Manchester's The Devils' Advocate podcast has landed on BBC Sounds.
The team pick over another 3-0 home defeat by Bournemouth and ask who in the current squad could play in Ruben Amorim's system next season.
